name: Mike Tyson Mysteries
overview: Mike Tyson is taking the fight from the boxing ring to the streets … by solving mysteries! Aided by the Mike Tyson Mystery Team — the Ghost of the Marquess of Queensberry, Mike’s adopted Korean daughter and a pigeon who was once a man — Mike Tyson will answer any plea sent to him.

episodes.name: The End
episodes.overview: Cormac McCarthy seeks Tyson's help in finding an ending for his latest novel.

episodes.name: Ultimate Judgment Day
episodes.overview: After receiving a message for help written on an IBM punch card, Mike goes to a chess tournament involving Deep Blue and Garry Kasparov.

episodes.name: Heavyweight Champion of the Moon
episodes.overview: Mike travels to the moon after an error from his auto insurer.

episodes.name: Is Magic Real?
episodes.overview: Mike looks for a leprechaun to prove magic is real.

episodes.name: Mite Tyson
episodes.overview: Our heroic protagonist, Mike Tyson, wakes up with mysterious bites on his skin causing lots of itching. Due to a doctors orders, it causes a friend to leave the house.

episodes.name: A River Runs Through it Into a Heart of Darkness
episodes.overview: A businessman wants Mike's help in winning over jungle-dwellers who are firmly against his canal project.

episodes.name: Kidnapped!
episodes.overview: When Pigeon can’t pay off a gambling debt, Gregor the gangster takes Mike’s daughter Yung Hee as collateral. Can Pigeon and Marquess get her back before Mike finds out she is missing? And why is Mike in Ohio giving a commencement speech?!

episodes.name: House Haunters
episodes.overview: Mike and the gang are plunged into the terrifying world of real estate, when Gary and Caitlin, a couple relocating to Phoenix, asks for help in choosing a house. Will they choose the ranch-style home, the one with the big yard or the one where a bunch of murders took place?

episodes.name: Night Moves
episodes.overview: When Mike and the gang try to solve the mystery of why a likeable guy named Andrew can never get a second date, Yung Hee discovers the hard way that it’s probably because he’s a werewolf. She makes it home alive, but will she stay that way once that the gang becomes convinced that she might now be a werewolf herself? And why does Mike Tyson have a drawer full of silver bullets? Run, Yung, run!

episodes.name: Ty-Stunned
episodes.overview: A terrified widow asks Mike and the gang to catch the chainsaw killer who dismembered her therapist husband and is now coming for her. Horrified, Marquess suggests that they call the police but Mike's too busy trying out his merchandise.

episodes.name: What's That Gnoise?
episodes.overview: In the season premiere, the gang help a soccer mom who is disturbed by a noise inside her minivan.

episodes.name: For The Troops
episodes.overview: Mike is asked to entertain troops in Afghanistan.

episodes.name: She's a Bayniac
episodes.overview: A suspicious husband wants the team to find out if his wife is having an affair. She is. But there are even more things to be discovered!

episodes.name: Last Night On Charlie Rose
episodes.overview: When a guest goes missing from the set of the late night interview show, Mike and the team are off to New York. But more importantly, will anyone remember it's Marquess' birthday?

episodes.name: Old Man of the Mountain
episodes.overview: A brother and sister struggle with the decision to put their elderly father in a nursing home. Naturally, they reach out to Mike Tyson for help.

episodes.name: Jason B. Sucks
episodes.overview: A negative online review of the Mike Tyson Mystery Team is unacceptable to Mike Tyson.

episodes.name: A Plaintive Wail
episodes.overview: Is the new location of a popular restaurant cursed?

episodes.name: A Tent Revival
episodes.overview: Mike Tyson's house has termites and must be tented.

episodes.name: Greece Is the Word
episodes.overview: The L.A. City Council contracts the Mike Tyson Mystery Team to investigate why goods are moving so slowly through the Port of Los Angeles.

episodes.name: Ogopogo!
episodes.overview: Pigeon must confront his past at the house by the lake.

episodes.name: Life Is But a Dream
episodes.overview: The team is called to the bedside of a woman who has fallen into a coma. Marquess realizes his "ghostliness" allows him to travel to the "dream realm" where he hopes to find her and bring her back. But will one woman's "dream" be everyone else's "nightmare"?

episodes.name: Unsolved Situations
episodes.overview: Coincidentally, Snoop Dogg has a mystery-solving team a lot like Mike Tyson's. Snoop Dogg, Larry Holmes, James Hong and Ross Mathews guest star.

episodes.name: Losin' It
episodes.overview: The team must help an overweight man get in shape. But it's not just about calorie counting or hitting the gym - it's about underlying emotional factors. Chuck Deezy, Steve Little guest star.

episodes.name: Yves Klein Blues
episodes.overview: Mike wants to get a new "summer" version of his track suit for those hot Vegas summers, but there is a snag. The color of blue he wants is very specific - Yves Klein Blue - which is currently unavailable because someone in Brazil has bought the world's supply... Who and why are two of the mysteries in this episode. Rhys Darby and Maya Rudolph guest star.

episodes.name: Unholy Matrimony
episodes.overview: A wealthy family is unsure about the man their youngest daughter is set to marry. They invite the Mike Tyson Mystery team to the wedding to confirm or alleviate their fears. Laurel Coppock, Mindy Sterling and Alan Thicke guest star.

episodes.name: Mystery for Hire
episodes.overview: Mike and the team are contacted by a large bank about a mystery. But even after several weeks of meetings and phone calls, culminating in the team being formally "hired," they realize they still have no idea what the mystery is about.

episodes.name: The Bard's Curse
episodes.overview: The Macbeth curse surfaces and appears to hit a theater director.

episodes.name: Save Me!
episodes.overview: Yung joins a Christian youth group. Nat Faxon guest stars.

episodes.name: The Farmer's Daughter Pt. 1
episodes.overview: Mike and the team go deep into the heartland to help out an old farmer. The mystery is solved rather quickly and the gang is back on the road, but when the Mystery Mobile breaks down, they are forced to spend the night back on the farm. When Pigeon meets the beautiful farmer's daughter, he and the team are shocked to find out from the farmer that she's been dead for six years. Cheryl Hines guest stars.

episodes.name: The Farmer's Daughter Pt. 2
episodes.overview: Mike and the team go deep into the heartland to help out an old farmer. The mystery is solved rather quickly and the gang is back on the road, but when the Mystery Mobile breaks down, they are forced to spend the night back on the farm. When Pigeon meets the beautiful farmer's daughter, he and the team are shocked to find out from the farmer that she's been dead for six years. Cheryl Hines guest stars.

episodes.name: Help a Brother Out
episodes.overview: Avoid going to Deezy's.

episodes.name: The Beginning
episodes.overview: Mike recalls the team’s first mystery.

episodes.name: Love Letters
episodes.overview: The team attends yard sales.

episodes.name: All About That Bass
episodes.overview: Professional Bass Fishing Tournaments are a real thing.

episodes.name: Foxcroft Academy for Boys
episodes.overview: A boy has gone missing from a prestigious New England prep school.

episodes.name: A Mine Is a Terrible Thing to Waste
episodes.overview: Mike celebrates the mining industry.

episodes.name: Broken Wings
episodes.overview: Take these broken wings, Pigeon, and learn to fly.

episodes.name: Ring of Fire
episodes.overview: A husband fears his wife's reaction to the loss of his wedding ring.

episodes.name: Mystery on Wall Street
episodes.overview: Is something evil manipulating the stock market (other than all the big investment firms and all of the banks)?

episodes.name: A Dog's Life
episodes.overview: Has a woman's late husband been reincarnated as her sweet little dog?

episodes.name: Spring Break
episodes.overview: Yung goes to Miami on Spring Break. The team sort of tags along by answering a "nearby" request for help.

episodes.name: At the Car Wash
episodes.overview: The team gets the Mystery Mobile a regular car wash for $9.99.

episodes.name: Thy Neighbor's Life
episodes.overview: Mike and the team are invited to a neighbor's house for dinner.

episodes.name: My Favorite Mystery
episodes.overview: The team gets stuck in an elevator and spend the time reminiscing about their favorite mysteries.

episodes.name: Tyson of Arabia
episodes.overview: The team go to Dubai, at the behest of an old Saudi Prince.

episodes.name: Carol
episodes.overview: Mike and the team are contacted by a woman named Carol who seems to have a secret admirer. She believes the secret admirer is a hoax though. The team investigates to find out if there's any truth to this secret admirer or if it's just a cruel joke.

episodes.name: Mike Tysonland
episodes.overview: Mike Tyson visits some land he owns in New Mexico.

episodes.name: The Gift
episodes.overview: The team helps a man find an anniversary gift for his wife.

episodes.name: Real Bitches of Newport Beach
episodes.overview: A show about authentic wives who live in a wealthy community.

episodes.name: The Pigeon Has Come Home to Roost
episodes.overview: In the season three finale, Pigeon’s past finally catches up with him.

episodes.name: Time to Fly
episodes.overview: When a very rich, very old man vanishes, everyone suspects his very hot, very young wife.

episodes.name: Make a Wish and Blow
episodes.overview: To make a little girl's wish come true, the team must visit the Wishing Well in Fantasy Forest.

episodes.name: The Bucket List
episodes.overview: Mike has a No. 1 item on his bucket list.

episodes.name: The Missing Package
episodes.overview: Sometimes it's not as easy as ordering online.

episodes.name: Pits and Peaks
episodes.overview: The team shares its highs and lows of the day around the dinner table, and it also goes to Scotland.

episodes.name: The Monahans and MacGoverns
episodes.overview: Star-crossed young lovers from feuding families ask the team for help.

episodes.name: The Death of Lyle Victor Linkus
episodes.overview: The death penalty debate is settled once and for all.

episodes.name: San Juan Puerto Rico Blows but San Juan Capistrano...
episodes.overview: Why haven't the swallows returned to San Juan Capistrano?

episodes.name: The Yung and the Restless
episodes.overview: Yung Hee wonders if being on a mystery team is what she wants to do with her life.

episodes.name: A Mystery in Little Italy
episodes.overview: What to do with baby octopus, plantains, smoked kippers and cream of mushroom soup.

episodes.name: The Christmas Episode
episodes.overview: The team travels to a nursing home to assist an elderly man seeking euthanasia, only to cause unexpected truths to come to light.

episodes.name: The Gift That Keeps On Giving
episodes.overview: White privilege turns on itself.

episodes.name: Your Old Man
episodes.overview: As Robert Frost says, nothing gold can stay.

episodes.name: Let's Make a Deal
episodes.overview: The very first Mike Tyson Mystery Team Podcast.

episodes.name: Pilot Error
episodes.overview: The thrills and chills of sexting.

episodes.name: Shop 'Til You Drop
episodes.overview: The team goes to the grocery store.

episodes.name: Landon's End
episodes.overview: A grieving father tries to help his beautiful boy.

episodes.name: The Stein Way
episodes.overview: Mike's attorney needs Mike's help.

episodes.name: Clam Bam Thank You Ma'am
episodes.overview: An unspeakable tragedy occurs at the Clam Shack.

episodes.name: You Can't Go Home Again
episodes.overview: A bell rings.
